授業方法: Classes are on demand. Students will be notified via LUNA if face to face time is required.

トピック.授業計画1:
The detailed Course Outline including weekly activities and assessments will be proved at the beginning of the semester. Basically, students will go through the following activities.
1. Email in English: the format, how the writing should be started, and how questions and negotiations should be made with polite expressions. This last 4~6 weeks.
2. Weekly fluency writing practice.
3. Analysing how a paragraph is effectively constructed. This will help students practise their own writing.
4. Paragraph writing: paragraph organisation (a main and supporting sentences, effective construction to aim to achieve convincing descriptions, arguments and opinions), punctuation and transition signals.
5. Occasional homework to be brought into class in the following week (this does not apply to online learning. Weekly activities should be followed).
トピック.授業外学習2:
1. Students are requested to prepare for each lesson as instructed in the Course Outline.
2. Occasional homework is requested to be brought into the next class (online learning will be formatted differently).
